title: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: The custom cookie name mentioned in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 does not affect URL rewriting as expected. Instead, the default cookie name 'jsessionid' is used.
EB: The document should accurately state that the custom cookie name does not affect URL rewriting and 'jsessionid' will be used by default.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war'. 
2. Access the URL http://localhost:8080/cookiename/
